metadata.title: CVE-2021-20226 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the io_uring in Linux kernel, where alocal attacker with a user privilege could cause a denial of serviceproblem on the system The issue results from the lack of validating theexistence of an object prior to performing operations on the object by notincrementing the file reference counter while in use. The highest threatfrom this vulnerability is to data integrity, confidentiality and systemavailability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
